markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Duskwalker Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=5756) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=751" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your connection to [psychopomps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=458) gives you the power to glimpse the near future and protect corpses from the ravages of undeath. You can cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445) and [_peaceful rest_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1625) each once per day as 2nd-rank divine innate spells.
name: Duskwalker Magic
